Articles.Content:
I've recently been planning a mission to Duna, I'm using nuclear engines but then when I add batteries, Kerbal Engineer Redux says that my TWR and Delta-V is increasing. This can't be right, does anyone know if this is just a glitch?

Just increased my Delta-V from 5000 to 18000 from doing this.
In the VAB it shows TWR and delta V as standard anyway - what are these saying?
What version of KER do you have? Current version is 1.1.8.2.
